name: AV Rebel
description:
AVRebel is a simple drone racing simulator ,where you can play with 1 or 2 players

player 1 controls : keyboard + mouse: -AWSD : Movement -Mouse : Steering -Ctrl : Descend -Space : Ascend

player 2 controls : Gamepad: -Left stick : Movement -Right stick : Steering -R2 / RT : Ascend -L2 / LT : Descend

disclaimer: this game is a result of training and prototyping, therefore it contains some bugs. I uploaded it as an inspiration to other game developers and as a part of my GameDev profile

#Drones #racing #simulation #Blender #BGE #2players #race
